rb_notes.editor:
{"ops":[{"insert":"Check whether multiple MAC addresses are accessed on a non-trunk interface. If the addresses exceed two or more, generate alert messages.

"},{"attributes":{"color":"#0066cc"},"insert":"Output:"},{"insert":"
		Alert items on device level: 
			1) Abnormal Port "},{"attributes":{"color":"#888888"},"insert":"(if mac address great than or equal to 2)"},{"insert":"

		CSV file:
			1) "},{"attributes":{"color":"#333333"},"insert":"Export CSV file about Switch port, which is possible rogue switch port in trunk mode."},{"insert":"
"}]}
rb_notes.text:
Check whether multiple MAC addresses are accessed on a non-trunk interface. If the addresses exceed two or more, generate alert messages.

Output:
		Alert items on device level: 
			1) Abnormal Port (if mac address great than or equal to 2)

		CSV file:
			1) Export CSV file about Switch port, which is possible rogue switch port in trunk mode.

rb_notes.editor:
{"ops":[{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#333333"},"insert":"This runbook is working for check "},{"insert":"on potential vulnerability of interface, include the possible rogue devices, interface rate, interface error counters and switchport port-security.

1. Discover Possible Rogue Devices
2. Check Interface Transmission Performance
3. Report Interface Error Counters
4. Display Interface Port-Security Status
"}]}
rb_notes.text:
This runbook is working for check on potential vulnerability of interface, include the possible rogue devices, interface rate, interface error counters and switchport port-security.

1. Discover Possible Rogue Devices
2. Check Interface Transmission Performance
3. Report Interface Error Counters
4. Display Interface Port-Security Status

rb_notes.editor:
{"ops":[{"insert":"Monitor Port Security Status:
	If find port-security action (contains Shutdown, Protect, Restrict), the Qapp will generate an alert message.
	If find interface status is <err-disabled>, the Qapp will generate an alert message.

Check Port Security Detail:
	Check port security detail. If port mac address is not none, the Qapp will generate an alert message.

Check Err-disable Status:
	Check port err-disable reason. If find interface err-disable status is not none, the Qapp will generate an alert message.

"},{"attributes":{"color":"#0066cc"},"insert":"Output:"},{"insert":"
		Alert items on device level: 
			1) Abnormal Port "},{"attributes":{"color":"#888888"},"insert":"(condition: if port-security enable)"},{"insert":"
			2) Err-disabled Port "},{"attributes":{"color":"#888888"},"insert":"(condition: if interface status is err-disable)"},{"insert":"
"}]}
rb_notes.text:
Monitor Port Security Status:
	If find port-security action (contains Shutdown, Protect, Restrict), the Qapp will generate an alert message.
	If find interface status is <err-disabled>, the Qapp will generate an alert message.

Check Port Security Detail:
	Check port security detail. If port mac address is not none, the Qapp will generate an alert message.

Check Err-disable Status:
	Check port err-disable reason. If find interface err-disable status is not none, the Qapp will generate an alert message.

Output:
		Alert items on device level: 
			1) Abnormal Port (condition: if port-security enable)
			2) Err-disabled Port (condition: if interface status is err-disable)

rb_notes.editor:
{"ops":[{"insert":"Collect"},{"attributes":{"background":"#fdfdfd"},"insert":" interface error counters "},{"insert":"and export the results to csv file.
 
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#0066cc"},"insert":"Output:"},{"insert":"
		CSV file:
			1) Input Error
			2) Output Error
			3) Runts
			4) Giants
			5) CRC
			6) Frame
			7) Overrun
			8) Ignored
			9) No Buffer
"}]}
rb_notes.text:
Collect interface error counters and export the results to csv file.
 
Output:
		CSV file:
			1) Input Error
			2) Output Error
			3) Runts
			4) Giants
			5) CRC
			6) Frame
			7) Overrun
			8) Ignored
			9) No Buffer

rb_notes.editor:
{"ops":[{"insert":"Collect the interface forwarding details and show the results on map.

"},{"attributes":{"color":"#0066cc"},"insert":"Output:"},{"insert":"
		Highlight items on interface level:
			1) Transmission
			2) Performance 
"}]}
rb_notes.text:
Collect the interface forwarding details and show the results on map.

Output:
		Highlight items on interface level:
			1) Transmission
			2) Performance
